mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.name, a.ACCOMMODATION_NO, a.ACCOMMODATION_TYPE, a.POST_NO, a.LAT, a.LNG, r.CHECK_IN_TIME, r.ROOM_NAME, r.STANDARD_OCCUPANCY, r.MAX_OCCUPANCY, r.ROOM_TYPE_NO, br.BASIC_RATE FROM ACCOMMODATION a INNER JOIN ROOM r ON r.ACCOMMODATION_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_NO INNER JOIN ( SELECT br1.ROOM_NO, br1.BASIC_RATE, r1.ROOM_TYPE_NO FROM basic_rate br1 INNER JOIN ROOM r1 ON r1.ROOM_NO = br1.ROOM_NO WHERE (r1.ROOM_TYPE_NO, br1.BASIC_RATE) IN ( SELECT r2.ROOM_TYPE_NO, MIN(br2.BASIC_RATE) FROM basic_rate br2 INNER JOIN ROOM r2 ON r2.ROOM_NO = br2.ROOM_NO GROUP BY r2.ROOM_TYPE_NO ) ) br ON br.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO ORDER BY a.ACCOMMODATION_NO, r.ROOM_TYPE_NO
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r2.rating), 1), 0) AS avgRate FROM room r JOIN review r2 ON r.ROOM_NO = r2.ROOM_NO where r.ACCOMMODATION_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT * FROM ACCOMMODATION a JOIN ROOM r ON r.ACCOMMODATION_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_NO join basic_rate br on br.ROOM_NO = r.ROOM_NO WHERE a.ACCOMMODATION_NO = #{boardNo} LIMIT 1
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r2.rating), 1), 0) AS avgRate FROM room r JOIN review r2 ON r.ROOM_NO = r2.ROOM_NO where r.ROOM_NO = #{RoomNo}
